name: Enter the boid
description:
The drones got out of control during an invasion, you need to collect as much drones as you can and let them fight for you, they have a mind of their own following the boid algorithm

Yellow(triangular) drones shoot, blue (star) drones deal damage when touching the enemies and green (circle) drones destroy enemy bullets

drones spawn in squared area

  • W - move forward
  • A - rotate to the left
  • D - rotate to the right
  • M - to mute
